name: Architectural Ceramic Money Banks
description:
Finally a good looking & good sized money bank for all those extra pennies found in jackets and under sofa pillows.... These handsome Rotunda Banks pay homeage to classic architecture.

The money banks are awash in modern white with charcoal-colored outlines of three popular renaissance buildings -  "Spire", "Pisa" and "Capital".

Saving spare change has never looked so stylish!

Dimensions: Spire (4" x 2 1/4" x 11 1/4" tall), Pisa (4 1/3" x 2 1/4" x 9 1/4 "tall), Capitol (7 1/4" x 2 1/2" x 12" tall)

Material: Ceramic

name: Swedish "Dala Garden" Serving Tray
description:
This beautiful serving tray has become immensely popular in a short period of time in Sweden. (And we are pleased to be the first store to offer it in the US!).

The talented Kurbits artist, Britt-Marie Nilsson, took an old, classic painting technique (Kurbits painting was very popular between 1720 and 1870 in Sweden), and put her own modern twist to it.

The vibrant colors and curvy calligraphy lines against the crisps, white background gives it a very updated and appealing look. Pretty enough to be displayed at all times.

The tray is made of laminated birchwood. (Can handle spills and water).

Dimensions: 18" diameter.

Made in Sweden.

name: Rue de Marli - Precious Wood No 27 Hand Cream

We have really taking a liking to Rue de Marli's natural beauty products (harmless ingredients and packaging that looks so fresh Scandinavian to us!).

Rue de Marli is a line of apothecary-inspired bath and body products born from a passion for biological herbs and traditional soap-making methods. With hydrating, relaxing, and skin-nourishing savoir-fair, Rue de Marli is committed to using only 100% certified organic ingredients and plant-based essential oils in their collection.

A non-greasy skin nourishing formulation that penetrates rapidly, leaving your skin moisturized and protected. blended with a highly effective cocktail of Argan oil, shea butter and organic pure essential oils of sweet Almond, pine, italian cypress and
red sandalwood.

Volume 3.3 oz.

name: Tove Adman's Concrete Candlestick - "Mix"
description:
We have admired Tove Adman's concrete candlesticks for years. They are immensely popular in Sweden and are often featured in leading design magazines.

The talented, Swedish designer Tove Adman has put her own modern twist on candlesticks from classic Swedish antique periods.

The "Style Mix" candle holder salutes several Swedish antique periods -- Baroque (ca 1600-1715), Rococo (1750-1775) and Art Noveau.

The candlestick is made of concrete and handmade in Sweden, on the beautiful "Viking" island Gotland in the Baltic sea.

Dimensions: Approx. 12 inches tall

Material: Concrete

Made by Tove Adman, Sweden.

name: Tove Adman's Concrete Candlesticks - "Gustavian"
description:
We have admired Tove Adman's concrete candlesticks for years. They are immensely popular in Sweden and are often featured in leading design magazines.

The talented, Swedish designer Tove Adman has put her own modern twist on candlesticks from classic Swedish antique periods. The "Gustavian" concrete candelstick has a design form very similar to candlesticks from the real Swedish Gustavian period (ca 1772 – 1810).

The candlesticks are made of concrete and handmade in Sweden, on the beautiful "Viking" island Gotland in the Baltic sea (from where the viking sheep pelts we carry in our store also come from).

Dimensions: Approx. 11 inches tall

Material: Concrete + Aluminum

The holder for the candle is made of aluminum and can be removed for cleaning

Made by Tove Adman, Sweden.

Note: Only sold as a pair. (2 candlesticks).

name: Splendid Nautical/4th of July Tassel Necklace
description:
"I am drawn  to jewelry that I can quickly put on and that will give me that instant extra chic factor", says Monika C, Founder, Splendid Avenue. "Good materials are a must".

Monika teamed up with Asa Daxberg, a successful silver jewelry designer in Texas, who made the necklace to Monika's specifications: Quality, handmade, one-of-a-kind piece of jewelry to be treasured for years to come.

"I have always wanted a lovely fashion accessory to wear for summer celebrations. And now I finally have it!", says Monika.

Material: All sterling silver. White, quality Italian leather tassel. Red coral and natural blue tapis gemstone. 

Dimensions: Chain approx. 33.5" L. Coral approx. 1.3" L. Tassel approx. 2.7" L. Medallion/blue lapis less than 1" L/each.

Handmade in the US. Note: All stones are unique and will vary somewhat in color/size.

Free shipping for US-based customers (7-10 days).

name: Grandma Pie Plate
description:
A modern pie plate with a very pretty, old feel lace pattern which very likely will become a conversation topic around the dining table. 

This friendly pie plate goes from oven to table with ease. Versatile and convenient. The enameled stoneware pie plate is dishwasher and oven safe. 

Material: Enameled stoneware
 
Dimensions: 9.5 inch diameter x 3 inches deep

Care instructions: Dishwasher safe, oven safe, microwave safe

name: Carrot Ornament (Satin thread)

name: D'Emploi Pilot Duffle Bag
description:
The perfect Euro-feel duffel bag for the stylish globetrotter!  

The bag is Waxed Canvas construction with leather handles, riveted for strength. 

The bag has two separate top and bottom compartments for organization, each with their own durable brass zipper. Top compartment has a waterproof nylon liner with a small zip pocket for valuables. 

Bottom compartment goes unlined making it easier to clean out while giving you a place for your dirty boots or wet towels. 

Outer organizer pocket for a notebook, phone and pens. 

Comes in Tan or Black with two different lining options of Sandstone or Desert camo bag liner. Shoulder strap included.

Dimension: 25"L x 10"W x 12"H 

100% handmade in the US.

Free shipping for US based customers. (UPS 7-10 days).

name: Sterling Silver Necklace "Melanie"

name: Decor Moss Heart - Large (Swedish design)
description:

Also make wonderful hostess gifts!

As an extra treat we will include 8 pearl colored push pin needles to use as decor.

name: True Feelings Candle Holder (set of 2)
description:

Claydies came up with the design blindfolded, as an experiment to see what the fingers would create without a pre-conceived idea. They were looking for a genuine contrast to very polished and deliberated designs.

The result is a unique, romantic and very genuine design.  

Comes as a set of 2 in a nice gift box.

Material & Color: white Porcelain

Dimensions: Ø 3" x H 2.8"

The candle holders are somewhat translucent and create a very warm atmosphere. Use with tealights.

description:
Embrace colder temperatures in this Nordic style hooded poncho cardigan from the Swedish fashion power house, Odd Molly! A classic style with a modern touch (you will get many compliments). Soft and warm wool blend knit with pockets in the front and a flirty fringe on the bottom.

Designed by Odd Molly in Sweden.
 
Free shipping for US based customers (USPS 2-3 days).

name: Swedish Reindeer Hides
description:
In Scandinavia, hides have been used in homes for many centuries to keep warm, especially during the winter season. Today they are frequently used in home decor for their beautiful, rustic look. 

We found these gorgeous, high-quality hides in a small village, 80 km north of the Artic Circle in Sweden. The company behind the pelts is a family business in its third generation.

The hides vary somewhat in size and color but we try to pick very similar products.

Dimensions: Approx. 34" wide, 48" tall

Place the hide on the floor to sit on in front of the fireplace. Use it on a sofa, bench or bed to keep warm. You will find many uses for these functional and gorgeous hides!

Please note, it is normal for a reindeer hide to shed hair. Avoid heavy traffic areas and excessive heat.

These hides are obtained and exported in accordance with Swedish law and are not listed in the CITIES (Convention of International Trade Endangered Species).

Free shipping for US customers. (Expect 2 weeks).

name: Swedish Sheep Skins (Gotland Pelts)
description:
Swedes love for sheep skins goes back centuries. 

Today you will find the skins used a lot in Swedish homes for functional decoration (as rugs and on chairs/sofas for extra warmth and comfort, and as mini blankets). 

Considered by many to be the most desirable sheep skins, are the smooth silky, gray curly and gorgeous skins from the old viking sheep on Gotland (a small, Swedish viking island in the Baltic sea). Gotland sheep pelts are world-renowned for their superior quality. They are strong, durable and very high luster with an array of rich gray shades. 

The pelts can be machine washed, 30° C, or washed by hand. After washing, simply air dry.

The pelts may vary a little in size and colors. We have tried very hard to pick similar pelts all with beautiful gray colors.

Dimensions: Approx. 25 x 33 inches

US based customers: Free shipping. (3-5 days).

Limited supply.

name: Swedish engraving, Maria Eleonora (17th c.)
description:
We found this attractive original engraving in Stockholm Sweden, featuring a portrait of Maria Eleonora. Maria Eleonora (1599–1655)was a German princess and queen consort of Sweden.
  
In 1620, Maria Eleonora married the Swedish king Gustavus Adolphus. She bore her husband a daughter, Christina, in 1626.
 
Maria Eleonora was described as the most beautiful queen in Europe.

Measures: Approx. 6.5" h, 5" w.

Excellent condition. Minimal wear consistent with age.

We put the portrait in a used wooden (not old) frame with glass. A temporary framing solution, perhaps. But it can be hung from the very get go.

We will add the wooden frame for no extra cost. Let us know if you are only interested in the engraving.

name: Swedish Antique Engravings (1800-1830)
description:
We found these handsome antique botanicals in Stockholm, Sweden. They are hand colored original engravings of great quality, featuring plants from the Swedish fauna. (We love the soft, calming colors).

Dates: ca. 1800-1830

Excellent condition. Wear consistent with age.

Timeless pieces that will always appreciate in value.

Measures: 8 5/8" h, 5" w.

We sell each piece separately, but we recommend the whole set for a nice decorative effect.

Displays beautifully in traditional as well as modern settings.

The engravings come unframed.

name: Antique engraving (1657) by Robert Nanteuil
description:
We found this stunning engraving in Sweden, featuring Nicolas Potier de Novion, the first president of the Parisian parliament (he was forced to resign after he was discovered forging documents). The engraving was made in 1657 by one of the finest engravers in France at the time, Robert Nanteuil. 

R. Nanteuil engraved portraits of many of the princes of Europe and of all the celebrated men of France in Louis XIV's time. He was rich, affable, and very generous, and would often send back payments for great plates when he found the sitters were poor. 

Robert Nanteuil was the pioneer of modern engraving and much of his work equals and strongly resembles the best of recent times.

Unfortunately someone put two small punch holes in the old engraving, that lowers the value of the piece. But it is still a high quality several hundred years old original engraving by Robert Nanteuil. You don't find those just about everywhere!

Excellent condition (except the two punch holes). Minimal wear. 

Measures: 11" h, 10.5" w.

Will look magnificent framed.

name: Swedish Antique Engravings (1800-1830)  - Blue
description:
We found these handsome antique botanicals in Stockholm, Sweden. They are hand colored original engravings of great quality, featuring plants from the Swedish fauna. (We love the pretty blue colors).

Dates: ca. 1800-1830

Excellent condition. Wear consistent with age.

Timeless pieces that will always appreciate in value.

Measures: 8 5/8" h, 5" w.

We sell each piece separately, but we recommend the whole set for a nice decorative effect.

Displays beautifully in traditional as well as modern settings.

The engravings come unframed.

name: Swedish Antique Engraving (1796)
description:
We found this handsome engraving in Sweden, featuring Swedish politican Clas Frietzcky. Clas Frietzcky (1727–1803) was a skilled business owner but left this profession to engage in politics. He became one of the leading people for the aristocratic opposition, which defended the rights of the Swedish Parliament to the king. He became the main opponent to king Gustav III on the issue of alcohol.

The engraving was made in 1796 by the renowned Swedish engraver, John Fredrik Martin. (His services were often used by the Swedish Royal establishment). 

Measures: Approx. 9.5" h, 7" w.

Excellent condition. Minimal wear consistent with age.

Will look amazing framed.

name: Old Swedish Botanical Engraving (Framed)
description:
We found this decorative botanical engraving in Sweden. It features a very handsome, hand colored "Ficus" (Fig tree) plant. Detailed and pretty, timeless colors.

We are unsure of the age. It is at least 70 years of age. But most likely older than that.

The engraving was once framed behind glass with a neutral style wooden frame (professionally framed in Stockholm). For more dramatic effect we would recommed  putting the art piece in a darker frame. But it works just the way it is right now!

Good quality, near excellent condition (minimal wear) with some paper wrinkles consistent with age. 

Measures 23" h x 17" w. 

Displays beautifully.

name: Swedish "Kakelugn" Tealight Holder
description:
Tile stoves have a long history in Sweden. In the 1700's, due to concerns over dwindling wood supplies in Sweden, two Swedes came up with a new energy efficient design (the internationally renowned "Kakelugn") and by the late 1700's Sweden had become famous for its cosy indoor temperatures.

Apart from providing an excellent source of heat, the "kakelugn" is also an object of great beauty. 

Imagine our delight when we came across this charming and well made tealight holder in the old town of Stockholm, Sweden. It is handmade in ceramic by the talented artist Katarina Andersson and is as close to a real Swedish "kakelugn" as we will get here in the US!

Add a tealight to a separate holder at the bottom of the piece and see the light through the small windows and the stove opening.

Color: Off-white with a blue pattern and gold colored details

Dimensions: Approx. 8" tall and 3.5" in diameter

Material: Painted & glazed ceramic (each piece is painted by hand and will vary somewhat in color)

Note: Can also be ordered in sweet rose/green colors w. gold on off-white.

name: Reindeer Antlers Bottle Opener
description:
What a perfect winter holiday gift! (Great hostess gift and stocking stuffer). Functional and so rustic pretty on the dining table! 

Handcrafted from a naturally shed reindeer antler, this piece brings us back to  Scandinavian deep, dark forests and arctic tundra. 

No two are exactly alike.

Material: Shed reindeer horn, steel

description:

name: Handvowen Plastic Rug "Gerda" (Mud)
description:
Swedes are practical people. And they like good design. So no wonder that the handwoven plastic rugs by Brita Sweden have become a mega hit in Scandinavia, and the rest of Europe. They are useable, handsome and feel good to walk on. (All rugs are reversible).

Place the rug in the kitchen, hallway or under a dining table. Bring it to the boat or the summer home! This rug is perfect for areas hit by lots of feet and spills. Just give it an occassional wash!

No rug is exactly identical since they are all handmade according to old, Swedish weaving traditions. The looms are from the 40's. 

Material: Plastic foil and polyester. Contains no heavy metals or toxic softeners. 

Washing instructions: Machine or hand wash in cold water. No spin cycle or tumble dry. Shape when wet and hang dry (not in strong sunlight). Carefully rinse spill. Don't rub. 

Note: Cold winter weather may cause the rug to break since the plastic looses its softness.

Made in Sweden by Brita Sweden.

name: Handvowen Plastic Rug "Helmi" (Yellow)
description:
Swedes are practical people. And they like good design. So no wonder that the handwoven plastic rugs by Brita Sweden have become a mega hit in Scandinavia, and the rest of Europe. They are useable, handsome and feel good to walk on. (All rugs are reversible).

Place the rug in the kitchen, hallway or under a dining table. Bring it to the boat or the summer home! This rug is perfect for areas hit by lots of feet and spills. Just give it an occassional wash!

No rug is exactly identical since they are all handmade according to old, Swedish weaving traditions. The looms are from the 40's. 

Material: Plastic foil and polyester. Contains no heavy metals or toxic softeners. 

Washing instructions: Machine or hand wash in cold water. No spin cycle or tumble dry. Shape when wet and hang dry (not in strong sunlight). Carefully rinse spill. Don't rub. 

Note: Cold winter weather may cause the rug to break since the plastic looses its softness.

Made in Sweden by Brita Sweden.

name: Royal Copenhagen Contrast Mug
description:
Royal Copenhagen, Purveyor To Her Majesty The Queen Of Denmark, is considered one of the most luxurious porcelain brands in the world. All products are hand painted in Denmark.

The "Contrast" design is hard porcelain meets soft silicone, subdued pastels meet stark white, colors clash the feminine mixes with the masculine, and the practical joins the expressive in a modern series of dinner service.

The fluted porcelain is a Royal Copenhagen cornerstone, the silicone is an innovation combined, they are a singular Danish design.

Capacity: 11 oz

name: Tall Swedish Reindeer Candlestick, White
description:
A First in the US!

In the north of Sweden, in the region of Lapland (largely north of the Arctic Circle), we discovered the very talented designer Annika Bränström. She makes exquisite products out of the beautiful antlers from Swedish reindeer. 

"I feel very connected to Lapland’s barren climate, drifted snow, bare mountain regions, sustainability and affinity to nature. I hope my designs reflect that", says Annika. 

Annika grew up in a small village surrounded by reindeer. From an early age she was fascinated by these beautiful animals and would often get lost in the wilderness following their flocks. 

Annika carefully handpicks her reindeer antlers and creates beautiful, unique designs. (Each product will vary somewhat).

Dimensions: H: approx. 23". W: approx. 12.5".

The antlers have been painted white with a non-toxic paint. Candlestick comes with two brass candle inserts. 

Handmade in Sweden by Lapland W Design. 

Please, allow for 2-3 weeks delivery. Free shipping for US based customers.

name: Blue Fluted Mega -- Bread Plate I
description:
Royal Copenhagen, Purveyor To Her Majesty The Queen Of Denmark, is considered one of the most luxurious porcelain brands in the world. All products are hand painted in Denmark.

The Blue Fluted MEGA pattern is a updated-classic created from an old Royal Copenhagen pattern.

It took the young Danish artist, Karen Kjældgård-Larsen, a strong vision and a lot of courage to put a modern twist to the iconic Blue Fluted pattern which has been in production in Denmark since 1775. 

She beautifully modified elements of the original pattern and gave it a modern look. Since its introduction, Blue Fluted MEGA has become a major success with its fresh, updated look while still honoring the Blue Fluted 18th century design.

Diameter: 6.75 inches
Main material: Porcelain
Design by: Karen Kjældgård-Larsen
Production start: 2000
Dishwasher and microwave safe.

Handmade by Royal Copenhagen in Denmark.

Free shipping for US based customers. Shipping within 2 weeks.

(Item No: 2386617).

Historical yet timeless. Royal Copenhagen’s very first porcelain dinner service, the Blue Fluted pattern, is as graceful today as when it was first adopted in Denmark in 1775.

It takes 1,197 brush strokes – no more, no less – to paint a Blue Fluted Half Lace dinner plate. Meticulous work and gorgeous art at its best.

Diameter: 6.75 inches
Material: Porcelain
Design by: Arnold Krog 
Production start: 1775
Dishwasher and microwave safe.

Handmade by Royal Copenhagen in Denmark.

Free shipping for US based customers. Shipping within 1 week.

(Item No: 1102617).

name: Handwoven Plastic Rug "Gunnel" (Blue)
description:
Swedes are practical people. And they like good design. So no wonder that the handwoven plastic rugs by Brita Sweden have become a mega hit in Scandinavia, and the rest of Europe. They are useable, handsome and feel good to walk on. (All rugs are reversible).

Place the rug in the kitchen, hallway or under a dining table. Bring it to the boat or the summer home! This rug is perfect for areas hit by lots of feet and spills. Just give it an occassional wash!

No rug is exactly identical since they are all handmade according to old, Swedish weaving traditions. The looms are from the 40's. 

Material: Plastic foil and polyester. Contains no heavy metals or toxic softeners. 

Washing instructions: Machine or hand wash in cold water. No spin cycle or tumble dry. Shape when wet and hang dry (not in strong sunlight). Carefully rinse spill. Don't rub. 

Note: Cold winter weather may cause the rug to break since the plastic looses its softness.

Made in Sweden by Brita Sweden.

name: Purse Hooks
description:
These distinguished and classy Luxe Link purse holders are sure to suite the most sophisticated tastes.

The Luxe Link folding purse hook is a stylish handbag hanger that wraps neatly around the base with a magnetic closure when not in use. 

Simply unwind the chrome chain link, place the stylish top onto the edge of any standard sized table, and voila! You have a totally invaluable hook to hang your handbag on. 

It works on any type of table surface, and is kept in place by gravity: the bag pulls down on the purse link to keep it in place! Keeping your purse safe and off the germ filled ground up to 15lbs.   The Luxe Link purse hook can also lock onto any handbag as a stylish purse charm. 

Comes in 3 different styles: Medallion, Grace & Leilani. The exclusive Luxe Link purse holder is environmentally friendly and made only with 100% recycled materials. Comes in a suede pouch.

name: Juliet Velour Dress - Olive Green
description:
A US-exclusive and we are beyond thrilled!

The wonderful high-quality velour dress by Juliet has become somewhat of a Swedish fashion classic. For more than a decade, this specific model has found its way into many Swedish kids’ closets. And no wonder. With its vibrant retro color combination, excellent quality and classic cut, this dress is always right. It works at school, play and parties; and it looks great with both shoes and boots. 

The perfect gift and the perfect clothing item to later pass along. Both kids and their parents will thank you!

Color: Olive green with cerise heart.

Material: Soft, high quality velour from Europe. The heart embellishment is beautifully stitched on. 

Machine washable. Air dry.

Adorable together with Juliet's cotton tights.

By Juliet in Sweden.

Made in Europe.

name: Classy Belgium Linen Napkins
description:
We have been looking for the perfect linen napkins that we want in our own homes - and we have found them! We are in love with  these Bon Appetite napkins. Beautiful organic linen from Belgium. Good sized. Perfect color and stiching. And the kind that look great without being ironed! 

Fabric: 100% Certified Organic Linen
 
Color: Flax w/ Slate Embroidery
 
Dimensions: 21″x21″

Set of 4.

Free shipping for US based customers. USPS 2-3 days.

name: Large Wooden Spool - Linen String & Scissors
description:
We first saw this large, rustic wooden spool with linen string and metal scissors in Sweden and we immediately added it to our own store.

A functional and a great decor piece! Use the string for gift wrapping, scrapbooking, flowers and any home projects where some good string is needed. The scissors have an old feel but are surprisingly sharp and get the job done.

Dimensions:  5.5 inches diameter, 5.7 inches tall. Scissors are 8.5 inches long by about 3.5 inches wide. 

A perfect gift to someone who has everything!

name: Modern Tiffany Drum Pendant
description:
We have really taken a liking to this gorgeous, modern drum pendant with white Tiffany glass. A simple geometrical shape and a timeless look.

The glass gives a warm, soft tone. 

Rigid stem incuded.

Suitable for many spaces. 
 
Dimensions: 16" wide x 10" high. 

Material: Polished chrome. White Tiffany glass.

Bulb type: 60w medium base.

By Elk Group International. 

(Model # 72022-3)

Free shipping for US based customers. UPS Ground 7-10 days.

name: Farmhouse Adjustable Pendant
description:
What a fabulous reproduction of an old Farmhouse light fixture!
It is adjustable with a cloth cord.

This farmhouse light is the perfect statement piece over your kitchen counter. Or hang three over the dining table.

Dimensions: 14" wide x adjustable up to 70" high.  

Material: Spun metal shade in oil rubbed bronze.

Bulb type: 100w medium base.

By Elk Group International. (Model # 65071-1)

description:

A very handsome atmosphere lamp.

The industrial look is still going strong in the design world, but we chose this pretty green color to add an warm twist to the style.

name: Work Lamp (Gold plated)
description:
Not as folksy and flimsy as the traditional construction lamp from the garage and the workshop. Instead a more refined look for the living room. 

The Work Lamp is made with a thicker wire, improved angles, and more of a long-lasting appearance. Gold and chrome plating adds character to this ready-made design, while the form and readiness preserve its blue-collar roots.

Find your own unique way to display and use the lamp.

Designed by Jonas Pettersson, John Löfgren, and Petrus Palmér who together constitute the acclaimed young design trio "FORM Us With Love".

Materials: Steel cage with a thin layer of 24K gold. (Gold plated). Black plastic cord and dimmer. 

Dimensions: Diameter 5.75", height 8.25". Bulb included. 

Packed in a black gift box.

From DesignHouse Stockholm.

Free shipping for US based customers. UPS Ground (7-10 days).

name: Mañana Lamp
description:
Talk about a chic and witty lamp! The "lean-against-the-wall" Mañana floor lamp, with its two feet, is designed by Marie-Louise Gustafsson. 

The lamp seems to have escaped from a comic strip, an insolent caricature leaning against the wall, just waiting for someone to turn it on. And why shouldn’t a lamp have plenty of character, a pencil thin, graphite grey sketched portrait with the power to entertain and tease? 

Grey lacquered steel. Dimmer foot switch. 

Dimensions: Height 67", width base: 15.7". Bulb included.
 
From: DesignHouse Stockholm (Sweden).

name: Ilse Jacobsen Suede Boots "Simple 18" - Orange
description:
Here is a new fall boot design for 2012 from the Danish mega designer, Ilse Jacobsen. Scandinavian casual chic and comfort is Ilse's design philosophy.

"Simple 18" is a comfortable, relaxed slip on boot, made in Europe. The soft suede boot features a contrast non-slip rubber sole, seam details and comes in several rich and pretty fall colors.

Material: Soft suede and rubber sole.

Designed by Ilse Jacobsen in Denmark.

Made in Italy.

Note: We feel these boots run a tad small. If you are between sizes, we recommend that you go up to the next size.

Free shipping for US based customers. (UPS Ground 7-10 days).

name: Swedish Wall Decor, Blue Geranium (Linen)
description:
A first in the US!

The talented Swedish designer Emma Sjodin has received great reviews in Scandinavia for her product line "Swedish Geranium". 

Here her beautiful pattern adorns a linen canvas to be hung on a wall. The motiv is based on a pencil sketch by Emma Sjodin, designed with a pretty blue patina. It looks absolutely stunning on a white wall! (You will find this wall hanging represented at several prestigious museum/cultural shops in Sweden).

The Geranium wall hanging comes in 3 different sizes - 39" x 27", 59" x 41", 78" x 59". 

It is printed in Sweden on half linen.

Designed and made by Konstig Design in Sweden.

Allow for approx. 3 weeks delivery.

name: Astrid Bjork's Whirl Ring (Sterling Silver)
description:
The talented, Stockholm based jewelry artist, Astrid Bjork, initially designed this whirl ring 18 years ago. It is still one of her best selling jewelry pieces and she ships it to customers all over the world.

"Customers interpret the design their own personal way. Some feel it looks like a French design, others like it comes from Africa! In Sweden the ring is very popular with architects and designers. It is incredibly heart warming that people respond so well to the design, many years later", says, Astrid Bjork.

Material: Sterling Silver
Dimension: Each ring is handmade and will vary a tad in width (between 0.4" and 0.5"). Let us know if the space to your knuckle is extra short.  The ring is handmade in Stockholm, Sweden. 

Allow for 2-3 weeks delivery. (The order can be rushed for an extra fee).
Note: We recommend that you have your ring finger measured with a "wide" ring before ordering. Many people tend to go up 0.5 in size.

name: "For Those I Heart" Personalized Necklace
description:
A first in the US! 

"I was looking for a niece piece of jewelry that my own tween girls could wear way into their teen years and beyond", said Monika, founder of Splendid Avenue. "I came across this timeless sterling silver necklace in Stockholm and knew I had found the perfect gift for girls of all ages --  tween, teens, Moms and their Moms!"

The very talented, Stockholm based jewelry artist, Astrid Bjork is behind the design of the necklace that you tailor make according to your own family configuration. (Or perhaps this necklace is about your best friend). Bigger hearts for adults. Smaller for kids. You decide the number of hearts. And, for example, if one person is extra tall, then Astrid will make that heart extra tall. You describe the characteristics of the people/person you hold dear!

"The hearts almost become like little people", says Astrid. "And not just any people but the one(s) you care for the most."

Material: Pendant and chain in sterling silver

Dimension chain: Approx. 16 inches

Dimensions pendants: Will vary. But a pendant for a typical family constellation consisting of two adults and two children measures approx. 1 inch.

The necklace is handmade in Stockholm, Sweden and comes in a pretty Astrid Bjork keepsake box.

Allow for 2-3 weeks delivery. (Rush order available for an extra fee).

name: ECO LONG SLEEVE PJ'S, Red & Silver Stripes
description:
US brand offering soft, chemical-free, 100% organic cotton sleepwear.

Kids spend many hours in their sleepwear. Created to give parents a social- and style-conscious kids’ sleepwear alternative, Skylar Luna combines superior comfort with contemporary design and the peace of mind provided by chemical free fabrics.

The lose-fitting two-piece style enables ease of movement. Skylar Luna meets Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) guidelines for children’s sleepwear.

Safe, chic and snuggly and color combinations that feel very Scandinavian to us. We like it all!

The PJs come in a reusable linen pouch.

Material: 100% Turkish organic cotton

Machine washable

name: Swedish Mocklis Moccasins - Light Blue Kurbits
description:
A Swedish classic! Generations in Sweden have enjoyed non-slip leather moccasins. They stay on little kids' feet, and they keep toes warm and happy.

We are pleased to be the first store in the US to carry the fabulous Swedish moccasin brand, Mocklis. We have fallen in love with their fun and unique designs and patterns!

The Mocklis moccasins are a combination of a sock and a shoe and are very comfortable on children’s feet. The cotton sock is soft and the double elastic yarns makes the moccasin stay on the foot. The leather sole is durable and non-slip.

The "kurbits" pattern is Swedish traditional folk art. This type of decorative painting was very popular in the region of Dalarna in the middle of Sweden during mid 1700s to mid 1800s.

Material: 80% Cotton, 10% Polyamide, 5% Lycra. Real leather sole.

Machine washable in cold water.

Made in Sweden by Mocklis.

It is quite possible that the Playsam Saab Roadster would look nicer than the car that you are currently driving. This luxurious child’s toy is modeled after the Saab 92001, the very first Saab ever created. 
 
As a fully functional push car, this toy has a steering wheel made of wood (birch) and a metal cross just like the old sports car steering wheels. Seat and bottom made of solid wood.
 
Material: Body: ABS plastic. Bottom: Chassis. Seat and Steering Wheel: Wood, Metal.

Playsam uses a lacquer paint, free of all toxic materials, including lead. 

Finish: Black Natural

Dimensions: L: 37 inches. H: 16 inches. Seat approx. 10 inches.

Designed by Ulf Hanses for Playsam.

Make a child's first car ride a memorable one! 

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

name: Wooden Hedgehog Clock
description:
With two-thirds of Scandinavia covered in forest and a region strong with environmentalists it is no wonder that we were immediately drawn to the charming, handmade, wooden wall clocks by Decoylab.

Keeping track of time doesn’t have to turn into a prickly situation with this adorable hedgehog clock! A perfect friend on the wall in a nursery or kids area!

• Eco-friendly 3ply bamboo 
• It's lovingly sanded and finished with natural oil
• Kid friendly numbered clock face 
• White hour and minute hands with gold second hand 
• Silent Clock Motor requires one AA battery

name: When Findus Was Little And Disappeared
description:
Sven Nordqvist is the new Astrid Lindgren. His books are hugely popular and his "Findus" series has sold over 7 million copies, translated into 44 languages. 

The Swedish author/illustrator Sven Nordqvist has won many prestigious awards for his work in children's literature. His texts and illustrations are ingenious and readers, young and old, will spend many happy hours pouring over them and laughing out loud.

Pettson is a Swedish farmer who lives alone in a red farmhouse together with his spunky & creative cat, Findus. As a reader you will be part of their many delightful adventures.
____________________________________________________
Farmer Pettson sat doing the crossword, with the cat on his knee.

"Tell me about when I disappeared", said Findus.

"You have not disappeared, said Pettson, "you are sitting right here".

"Yes, but -- when I was little."

"Oh then... But you've heard the story so often before."

"But tell it to me anyway!"
____________________________________________________ 
Recommended age group: 4-8 years.

name: Pancakes For Findus
description:
Sven Nordqvist is the new Astrid Lindgren. His books are hugely popular and his "Findus" series has sold over 7 million copies, translated into 44 languages. 

The Swedish author/illustrator Sven Nordqvist has won many prestigious awards for his work in children's literature. His texts and illustrations are ingenious and readers, young and old, will spend many happy hours pouring over them and laughing out loud.

Pettson is a Swedish farmer who lives alone in a red farmhouse together with his spunky & creative cat Findus. As a reader you will be part of their many delightful adventures. 

"Pancakes for Findus" is the first story of the adventures of farmer Pettson and his cat Findus. Pettson wants to bake a pancake birthday cake for the cat who has three birthdays a year. But how can they get the eggs for the cake when the bull is in the way?

Recommended age group: 4-8 years

name: Findus And The Fox
description:
Sven Nordqvist is the new Astrid Lindgren. His books are hugely popular and his "Findus" series has sold over 7 million copies, translated into 44 languages. 

The Swedish author/illustrator Sven Nordqvist has won many prestigious awards for his work in children's literature. His texts and illustrations are ingenious and readers, young and old, will spend happy many hours pouring over them and laughing out loud.

Pettson is a Swedish farmer who lives alone in a red farmhouse together with his spunky & creative cat Findus. As a reader you will be part of their many delightful adventures. 

In "The Fox Hunt" Pettson and Findus learn about their neighbor going on a fox hunt. Pettson and Findus come up with their very own, creative & funny plan on how to save both the hens and the fox. 

Recommended age group: 4-8 years.

name: Swedish Gustav III Monogram Candle Sconce
description:
The talented Swedish designer Maria Lilliecreutz is behind this unique candle sconce. The plaque is handmade of plaster and fibreglass (for stability). The candle holder is hand forged iron.

The inspiration for this art piece is an original plaque from the 18th century hanging in the basement of an old building behind the Royal Theater in Stockholm. The monogram of the Swedish King Gustav III (1746-1792), adorns the plaque. Gustav III is among the more well-known of the Swedish monarchs, famous for his passion for theatre and architecture and culture in general.  

Maria's version is very similar to the original plaque but the iron candle holder is her own design.

The candle holder is attached to the wall with two screws. The plaque is placed on top and hung with another screw. (3 screws enclosed).

Measurements: The plaque measures approx. 22 (h) x 13 (w) inches.

Handmade in Sweden.

We only carry a small stock of sconces. They are all originals and the only ones sold in the USA.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

name: Egg/snaps cups (set of 4)
description:
"I have been looking for simple, handsome egg cups for the longest time. When I bought these in Stockholm for a friend I knew I had found the perfect ones!", says Monika, founder of Splendid Avenue.

Every breakfast table/tray deserves some fancy egg cups.

We are very pleased to the first store in the US to carry these stylish Swedish cups.

Height: 3 inches.

Fine white bone china. Machine washable. Microwaveable. 

Set of 4 (four different patterns in each box).

Come in a black gift box.

Designed by Manses Design in Sweden.

Pssst... Can also be used as Snaps glasses!

name: The Perfect Swedish Sponge Cloth
description:
A fast absorbing, fast-wiping and hygienic counter/wipe sponge cloth is a main staple in most Swedish homes. It is designed for efficient spill-pickup and fast wiping of wet surfaces in kitchens.

Why use expensive paper towels when a cloth wipes faster, absorbs better and ensures lint-free wet wiping? And this one is machine washable so you can use it over and over again!

Even better, the cloth is 100% compostable and fully biodegradable, so good for the environment too!

The wipe cloth has the talented designer Emma Sjodin's beautiful dragonfly design on it.

Pretty and functional - a very smart, Swedish thing!

Material : The sponge cloth is made of nature’s materials; 1/3 cotton and 2/3 cellulose

Machine washable: Warm cycle

Designed and made in Sweden by Konstig Design.

description:
A First in The US!

These pretty coasters feature a dragonfly and cow parsley. They are designed by the talented Swedish designer Emma Sjodin and are perfect for any table (and as a hostess gift!).

The coasters come in a set of 4. (Light green-creme color on one side, midnight blue with a green tint on the other side).

Material: Laminated birch. The coasters are individually hand made from the finest Scandinavian birch wood. Specifically sourced for its fine grain and rare width - the trays have no joints and are made from single sheets of birch, providing a high quality finish and longevity. 

Dimensions: Approx. 3.5" square 

Dishwasher safe.

Designed and made by Konstig Design in Sweden.

description:
Coming to our store in September 2012. YES - we are super excited!

name: Swedish Birch Motif Pottery
description:
Birch is a highly treasured tree in the northern parts of Europe. In Scandinavia birch was the symbol of the goddess Nerthus, which was considered the great Mother Earth. 

Sweden's on-going love for birch trees is also prevalent in design. The light colored bark is always welcome in Swedish homes. 

The talented, Swedish potter, Maria Holmberg, found her way of incorporating a birch pattern on her pottery with a special ceramic printing technique.

Her handmade pottery was a major hit at the leading design trade show in Sweden, early 2012. And no wonder. Her pottery is simple and beautiful. And with the birch motif - Simply Swedish and beautiful.

We are very proud to be the first store in the US to represent Maria's stunning clay art.

All pottery is handmade by Maria Holmberg in Stockholm, Sweden.

Dimensions: Approx. 4 inches tall and 4 1/8 inches in diameter.

ALL SOLD OUT.

description:

"My source of inspiration is Scandinavian nature and craftsmanship. I heart timeless simplicity and carefully choose my high quality fabrics. With the Scandinavian nature in mind I have chosen soft and earthy colors. Some of the colors in the palette come from driftwood collected at the coast, from blueberries in the forest and the pink sky early in the morning."

Material: 100% cotton

Dimensions: 20 " x 20 " (50 x 50 cm)

No more wet umbrellas dripping all over the hall. A contrast of soft sponginess and austere steel. 

Eva Schildt’s umbrella stand is not only a functional design piece, it’s an Yves Klein inspired sculpture, with its artificial sponge and the cheeky frame in lacquered steel. The utilitarian and sculptural design, as pencil thin as a sketch for a cartoon, was a hit at the furniture fair in Milan. 

Material: Lacquered steel base and synthetic sponge.

Color: Black steel. (Light blue steel no longer available).

Dimensions: Height 28.5"

From DesignHouse Stockholm, Swedem

Free shipping for US based customers. UPS Ground (7-10 days).

description:
A popular, Swedish side table, designed by Magnus Löfgren. Decorative and functional at the same time. The table is versatile and can be used as a side table, as a plant table, or as a set of tables in front of a sofa. The tray has a high rim to prevent food and other things from spilling over.

A steel tray for the popular Swedish tray table stand. Designed by Magnus Löfgren. The tray comes in 3 colors - white, black and red. 

The Tablo Tray has a high rim to prevent food and other things from spilling over.

Material: Lacquered steel.

description:
Add some lovely Swedish design to your home with this popular Birch (in Swedish "Björk") rug, designed by Lena Bergstrom.

“The birch, a tree that can be found all over Sweden, is my inspiration for the Björk collection. The expression in the woven structure comes from the black and white trunk of the birch and the leather represents the inside of the bark."

The color tones of Björk create a marbled effect through a warp of cotton intertwined with a weft in wool, known not only for its softness, but also for its built-in resistance to soiling thanks to its natural oils. 

Materials: Wool. Leather edging.

The sterling silver bracelet has an oversized ring and a rectangle charm with the Sahara logo as understated design elements. 

Material: Sterling silver 

Dimensions: Comes in 2 lengths: 7.4 inches and 8 inches. Each chain link is approx 1/4 " wide.

Designed in Sweden by Lovisa Wester for Sahara Silver.

Free shipping to US based customers (UPS 7-10 days).

name: Sterling Silver Hoop-Disc Earrings "Kitty"
description:
The perfect design for daily wear! Classy, chic with a modern twist -just the way we like it over here at Splendid Avenue!

The "Kitty" earrings feature an open silver hoop with a tiny, decorative flat stop. A flat disc hangs on the hoop and adds a unique, modern design touch.

These earrings attract compliments!  (Monika, the founder of Splendid Avenue wears them all the time).

Material: Sterling silver

Dimensions: The hoop measures approx. 0.6 inches in diameter. Disc  approx. 0.5 inches in diameter. 

The earrings come in a small black satin purse (with a zipper). 

Designed in Sweden by Lovisa Wester for Sahara Silver.

name: Sterling Silver "Italian Words" Ring
description:
We have a serious crush on this statement ring made by the native Swedish jewelry designer Asa Daxberg.

It is designed to sit on your middle finger for a little bit of an unexpected edge. 

"I had never worn a ring on my middle finger in my entire life", says Monika, the founder of Splendid Avenue. "Now I never take it off! It is simple, modern and chic all in one package. And it is very comfortable to wear."

The ring is handmade in sterling silver and Asa has hand stamped some of her favorite Italian words on the ring -- all positive reminders on what is important in life -- "Vita, Amore, Fiducia, Natura, Fortuna, Fede".

The ring is appox. 3/4 inches wide.

The ring is custom made to size (size 6-9). We recommend that you have your middle finger measured before ordering.

Handmade in the US.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 days standard UPS shipping).

name: Sterling Silver Bar (Small) Necklace
description:
Here is a smaller version of Asa Daxberg's hugely popular "Silver Bar" necklace.

It has a very Swedish style, designed with love and the country in mind. People who get their hands on this modern, sophisticated necklace - love it. It stands out.

Asa prefers to layer her own necklaces. Her necklaces are all designed so they can be worn together.

The silver bar is a substantial piece of sterling. It is all solid and weighs approx. 0.5 ounce. The sterling silver chain is approx. 29 inches long.

Handmade in the US.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

Note: If not in stock, we will need 10-14 days to have the necklace made and shipped to you.

name: Splendid - The Sterling Silver Bar Necklace
description:
We are very proud to be the first on-line store to represent the Swedish native silver jewelry designer Asa Daxberg.

A simple and stunning sterling silver bar necklace designed specifically for our store. We have named it “Splendid”. And splendid it is. It has a very Swedish style, designed with love for the country in mind. People who get their hands on this modern sophisticated necklace - love it. It stands out.

“Asa taught me to tie a knot on the chain, and that’s how I like to wear it”, says Monika, the founder of Splendid Willow Avenue.

The “Splendid” bar is a substantial piece of sterling silver. It is all solid and weighs approx. 0.7 ounces. The chain is approx. 35 inches long.

Handmade  in the US.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

Note: If not in stock, we will need 10-14 days to have the necklace made and shipped to you.

description:

The Chunky Bead Necklace is an absolute favorite of ours.

Recycled glass beads from Africa strung on a hand-dyed leather cord accompanied by a hand hammered sterling silver medallion in the front and Asa’s signature silver tag in the back.

name: Chunky Bead & Silver Cross Necklace - Greige
description:
We are very proud to be the first on-line store to represent the Swedish native silver jewelry designer Asa Daxberg.

My lovely friend Michele was instrumental in adding this specific model to my store. I hope the good vibe shines through!
 
Here Asa has attached a simple, Swedish style, sterling silver cross on a hand-dyed leather cord strung with recycled beads from Africa. On the back rests Asa’s signature silver tag.
 
A statement piece for both casual and evening wear, you can be assured it will bring many compliments.
 
Would also be a a wonderful art piece in the home. Hang it froma a nail or place it over some beautiful books for a personal touch.
 
The necklace is handmade in the US.
 
Length: Approx. 42 inches long.
 
Sterling silver cross: Approx. 2.5" high x 1 5/8" wide.
  
US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

name: Earthy Trio Pendant Necklace
description:
We are very proud to be the first on-line store to represent the Swedish native silver jewelry designer, Asa Daxberg.

Here is one of Asa's latest designs - an earthy, simple necklace with three pendants -- a simple, Swedish style cross, a piece of authentic coral bamboo and Asa's signature silver tag. All with a celebration of life and mother nature.
 
“Asa taught me to tie a knot on the chain, and that’s how I like to wear it”, says Monika, the founder of Splendid Willow Avenue.
 
The chain is approx. 35 inches long.

Note: All three pendants are made with Sterling Silver. The long chain is also made of Sterling Silver. 
 
If you instead prefer the same long chain in quality silver colored brass (its patina will not change easily), let us know and we will happily accomodate you. The total price with the brass chain will then be $100. (So less).
 
Handmade in the US.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

Note: If not in stock, we will need 10-14 days to have the necklace made and shipped to you.

description:

Recycled glass beads from Africa strung on a hand-dyed leather cord (brown) accompanied by a hand hammered sterling silver medallion in the front and Asa’s signature steriling silver tag in the back.

An understated elegant, one-of-a-kind piece, for both casual and evening wear. 

The bracelet is handmade in the US.

Length: Approx. 8 inches long.

Sterling silver medallion: Approx. 3/4 inches diameter.

name: Ilse Jacobsen Classic Leather Bag (Black)
description:
A city chic handbag from the Danish mega designer Ilse Jacobsen. Understated elegant design. High quality. Always right.

The bag is roomy and has lots of pockets. In the middle is a large zippered compartment. On each side are two more compartments which close with built in magnets. 

The bag is lined and has three more small pockets on the inside.

A roomy zipper pocket on the outside is the perfect spot for cell phones and keys.

Dimensions: Approx. 13 inches tall (not included straps) x 17 inches wide. Pocket: Approx. 7 inches tall x 8 inches wide

Material: Leather

Leather tassels complete the look.

The straps are the perfect length for comfortably carrying the bag in the hand or over the shoulder.

FREE shipping for US based customers (UPS Ground 7-10 days).

Note: If not in stock, expect a delivery time of approx. 14 days.

name: Ilse Jacobsen Lifestyle Umbrella - Large
description:
So in style.

Large, sturdy, waterproof polyester umbrella by the Danish Design Powerhouse, Ilse Jacobsen.

Just press the button on the handle and the umbrella automatically pops up and quickly shelters you from big raindrops. The frame is exceptionally sturdy and stands against nasty gales.

The popular umbrella comes in multiple colors. Yellow is sold out. We carry: Sweet Rose, Bisquit, Coral, Black and Lime.

See colors here: http://www.ilsejacobsen.dk/dk/large-umbrella. (Copy into your browser if the link is not appearing).

Please, let us know at check-out which color you want us to ship. Or e-mail us at: sales@splendidavenue.com

name: Ilse Jacobsen Rubber Boots/Orange Sole
description:
The very latest rubber boot model from the iconic, Danish designer, Ilse Jacobsen. These high-quality boots are designed for hours of serious walking and playing in rain or snow.

This model is based on Ilse Jacobsen's classic rainboot (Tall with laces). It comes without laces but instead a colorful sole (orange) as well as a decorative tag in the back. (It is also a bit lighter than her classic model).

This boot is a great companion for Ilse Jacobsen's raincoat with color accents. (Or anybody who wants to look stylish on days when the sun is refusing to cooperate).

US based customers: FREE SHIPPING.

name: Ilse Jacobsen Rubber Riding Boots - Black
description:
We are happy to carry one of Ilse Jacobsen's very latest boot designs - "The Rubber Riding Boot". It is a very classy, black equestrian pull-on design, with a tan leather trim adorned by an elegant emblem.

Ilse Jacobsen's quality rubber boots have become design icons in Scandinavia. They are designed for hours of serious walking and playing in rain or snow. 

100% natural rubber. Handmade in Europe. Shaft lined in cotton fleece. Footbed lined in wool. Shaft height approx. 15 1/2" from arch. Boot opening approx. 14.25" around. Heel approx. 1".

Note: The boots are on the roomy side. If you are in between sizes, we recommend that you go down to the next size.

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

SPECIAL: We will include a nice IJ "Care Kit" with your order (sponge + oil). A $25 gift value. (As long as supplies last).

100% natural rubber. Handmade in Europe. Shaft lined in cotton fleece. Footbed lined in wool. Shaft height approx. 10" from arch. Boot opening approx. 14 1/2" around. Heel approx. 1 1/4".

name: Aspiga Leather "Bari" Sandal - Silver
description:
The UK based company Aspiga has taken Europe by storm. Aspiga's stunning, leather sandals have been featured in many major fashion magazines incl. Vogue and Marie Claire.

Aspiga uses suppliers in Africa and India, with small work forces (not large factories) creating much needed jobs for local men and women, and exonomic development for their communies. All of the sandals are handmade. 

At Splendid Avenue we know a good thing when we see it!

The Bari Leather Sandal features an elegant beaded flower design on a nautral leather base. The crystal beads adds a touch of glamour to any wardrobe, day or night.

Genuine leather upper, with contrast white stitching.

Flat leather sole, with a very small non slip heel.

Hand made in India.

The sandals run a tad on the small side. If you are in-between sizes we recommend that you go up to the next size.

description:

We are super thrilled to now be offering Odd Molly's fabulous jaquard knit cardigan in our store. This cardigan is an Odd Molly classic. Always fabulous - always right.

Both feminine and edgy with a modern Scandinavian folklore feel,  this will become your favorite cardigan.

Limited edition. 

Note: The cardigans run small so we recommend that you go up a full size.

name: Ilse Jacobsen Full Length Raincoat (Black/Colors)
description:
Danish design icon, Ilse Jacobsen's, raincoats from the Fall-Winter 2012 collection originate from the groundbreaking minimalism that shaped fashion’s early 1960s -- relaxed luxury and smart casuals with a twist of country feel. 

Very Scandinavian current & chic!

Ilse Jacobsen's full length softshell, hooded raincoat is stylish, warm and offers 100% protection from rain. The coat has a flattering slim cut and a water repellent surface (Teflon).

It has warm fleece on the inside (black). The coat has taped seams and water resistent zippers. It comes with all the small quality details you want from a designer coat.

The sleeves are made extra long -- to make sure that your clothes underneath are always protected from the rain. The hood is roomy.

Machine washable, cold, with special liquid water repellent detergent. 

US based customers: FREE shipping. (7-10 day standard UPS shipping).

name: Wrap Tie Dress By Jarbo (Black)
description:
A simple, chic dress. A Jarbo bestseller. 

You will get many compliments wearing this modern version of the classic wrap tie dress. It has a nice cut and drapes beautifully around any waistline, creating the perfect hourglass figure. Flattering scoop in the front and the back.

The dress is made to be worn two different ways. Turn the dress completely around and you will get a different scoop to the neckline. One a more conservative neckline and the other a sassier look (deeper neckline). How brilliant!

Made of 95% High Twist Rayon and 5% Lycra.  

Dry clean.

Design: Jarbo, USA.

Made in Seattle, USA.
